sentences.en: Continue whisking until the mixture looks smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 一直搅拌，直至混合物变得均匀细腻。

sentences.en: If prepared many hours ahead, the mixture may separate out.
sentences.cn: 如果提前几个小时就准备好了，混合物可能会分离开。

sentences.en: Liquidize the mixture and then pass it through a sieve.
sentences.cn: 将混合物打成泥状，然后用滤网滤一下。

sentences.en: Now you just alternate layers of that mixture and eggplant.
sentences.cn: 现在你只需把茄子和拌料一层层交替放好。

sentences.en: Pour the mixture into four small dishes.
sentences.cn: 把混合料倒入四个小碟子里。

sentences.en: Pour the mixture into the cake tin and bake for 45 minutes.
sentences.cn: 把混合物倒进烤模烤制45分钟。

sentences.en: Prepare the souffle dish before making up the souffle mixture.
sentences.cn: 在搅拌做蛋奶酥的各种原料之前先要把盘子准备好。

sentences.en: Smooth the mixture with the back of a soup spoon.
sentences.cn: 用汤勺的背面把混合料抹平。

sentences.en: Strain the mixture through a double thickness of muslin or cheesecloth.
sentences.cn: 用双层平纹细布或干酪包布过滤混合料。

sentences.en: Tap each one firmly on your work surface to settle the mixture.
sentences.cn: 在工作台上逐个轻轻敲紧，让混合物变得密实。

sentences.en: The flowerbeds brim with a mixture of lilies and roses.
sentences.cn: 花坛里长满了百合和玫瑰。

sentences.en: The mixture can be used as a gargle several times a day.
sentences.cn: 每天可用这种混合液漱几次口。

sentences.en: The offspring contain a mixture of the genetic blueprint of each parent.
sentences.cn: 子女身上遗传了父母双方的基因型板。

sentences.en: The town is a mixture of the old and the new.
Twist the mixture into individual sausages without splitting the skins.
sentences.cn: 将混合物拧成一段段的香肠，不要把皮弄破。

sentences.en: Using 2 spoons, mould the cheese mixture into small balls or ovals.
sentences.cn: 用两把小匙将奶酪混合物塑成圆球或椭圆球形状。

sentences.en: Whisk the mixture until it is smooth and creamy.
sentences.cn: 把混合物搅拌至均匀细腻。

words.tran_cn: 混合的；形形色色的；弄糊涂的
混合器；搅拌器；[电子] 混频器
调酒术；制备混合饮料的手艺
混合；弄混（mix的过去式和过去分词）
配制；混淆；使混和；使结交

phrases.tran_cn: 波尔多混合剂（一种硫酸铜溶液，用于杀虫）
低熔混合物；共晶混合物
气体混合物；毒气混合物
稀混合气；浓度低的混合物
n. 反应混合物；反应混合液

trans.tran_en: a combination of two or more different things, feelings, or types of people
